title: Catalysis
creator_credit: Millbank Films and Stewart Hardy Films
brief_description: Role of catalysis in lowering activation energy explained. Use on platinum gauze in production of nitric acid described, also role of Ti CL3 in polymerization of propene. Model of lysozyme with active site shown. Catalase activity in blood demonstrated. Animation by Stewart Hardy Films.
